page.title: 10Bus Services - Caerphilly
page.content: Six{bus companies}operate from{Caerphilly Bus Station}to major and local towns. There is a regular weekday service to Cardiff, Newport and Pontypridd but on Sundays, there is a regular service only in the afternoons. There is a daily bus service to{London}except Sundays for Â£10 day return. There are frequent local weekday services to all parts of the Caerphilly area except Rudry. Three buses a day run to Rudry. On Sundays there are regular afternoon services only, with the exception of Senghenydd which has a regular service all day. No buses run to Rudry on a Sunday.
